attributes.additional_details:
http://www.chroniclelive.co.uk/news/north-east-news/eu-referendum-what-article-50-11519700
(This newspaper article summarises the procedure for the invocation of Article 50, and also details David Cameron's delaying tctics)
attributes.background:
David Cameron promised that he would invoke Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty in order to  get UK out of EU in the case of an 'Out' vote.
We have an 'Out' vote, now keep your promise, without further prevarication.
